title: Perfectly Simple Flashlight Ad-Free w/ Optional Viewfinder Search Mode
comment: Usually it's when I'm the last one to bed - I turn off the house lights and suddenly have to navigate through instant darkness - but however you find yourself in the dark, this is the flashlight app I always recommend. I keep it on my phone's lock screen for instant access, because if you suddenly need a light, you need it quickly! Lots of cool flashlight apps out there with strobes or color - but in that moment when it suddenly goes dark, you just need bright light fast without having to think about modes.

THIS IS THE ONLY FLASHLIGHT I AM COMFORTABLE USING!  THANK  YOU TO THIS PERSON/PEOPLE AGAIN FOR NO RESTRICTIONS!  I have had other friends use this same light and will still recommend it! title: Best Flash Light App Ever
comment: This is everything you could want in a flashlight app! No advertising, no shady extra permissions requested. Other flashlight apps offer things like "strobe" and "Morse Code" modes. I thought those were super cool, but then only ever used those features one time for five minutes. This app has two extra modes, both of which are actually useful depending on the context. Black Screen mode basically makes the screen entirely black to save power and reduce glare in your face, depending on you're holding your device. Camera mode just feeds the front camera video to your screen, which is also useful, again, depending on what your device is and how you're using it. Don't waste your time with any other apps, this one is the king!

comment: When I want a "tool" app like this, I want something simple yet elegant. This app is exactly that, nothing to play around (except the very nice live view mode and 2 choices for the app's background while it's running).     BTW: it turns on the camera LED very fast (< 1 sec).
